divs: Sighting DetailsOutside smoking a cigarette, looking straight up and saw it. Was looking at the moon and the mercury (I think mercury) and it caught my eye, I first thought it was a satellite but then it shot towards the south so quick that I was gone, I ran inside and told everyone.
Summary: Slow like a satellite , then shot towards the south at a very high rate of speed, gone within a split second
trends: There has been one other sighting in Raynham
There were no other sightings in Raynham on or around January 20th 2013
